# Brooklands (Trafford ward)

| subdivision_type                = Country
| subdivision_name                = United Kingdom

| subdivision_name1               = England
| subdivision_type2               = Region
| subdivision_name2               = Trafford
| subdivision_type3               = County
| subdivision_name3               = Greater Manchester
| subdivision_type4               = Metropolitan borough
| established_title               = Created
| established_date                = May 1973
| named_for                       = Brooklands, Sale
| government_footnotes            =  UK Parliament constituency: Wythenshawe and Sale East
| government_type                 = Unicameral
| governing_body                  = Trafford Metropolitan Borough Council
| leader_party                    = Labour
| leader_title                    = Leader of the council
| leader_name                     = Tom Ross
| leader_title1                   = Councillor
| leader_name1                    = Will Jones (Labour)
| leader_title2                   = Councillor
| leader_name2                    = Rose Thompson (Labour)
| leader_title3                   = Councillor
| leader_name3                    = Bilal Babar (Labour)
| area_total_sq_mi                =
| population_total                = 10,434
| footnotes                       = Area and population statistics from the 2011 Census
| website                         =
}}
Brooklands is an electoral ward of Trafford, Greater Manchester, covering the south-east of the town of Sale, including most of the Brooklands, Sale area. It is represented in Westminster by Mike Kane MP for Wythenshawe and Sale East The 2011 Census recorded a population of 10,434.
Councillors
As of 2022, the councillors are Will Jones (Labour), Rose Thompson (Labour), and Chris Boyes (Conservative).
